objective: Implémenter la vue MeetingList pour iOS en SwiftUI équivalente à Android

content: Task: Implement MeetingListView.swift for iOS with Liquid Glass design. See context.md for features and reference Android implementation.

Created comprehensive MeetingListView with Liquid Glass design system, integrating with existing MeetingListViewModel (shared Kotlin state machine). Implemented grouping by status (SCHEDULED, STARTED, ENDED, CANCELLED), pull-to-refresh, and full accessibility support.
reason: Matched Android MeetingListScreen functionality while following iOS SwiftUI best practices and Liquid Glass design system

content: MeetingListView, MeetingEditSheet, and MeetingGenerateLinkSheet created with full Liquid Glass design integration. Uses existing MeetingListViewModel with shared Kotlin state machine. Need tests for: 1) MeetingListViewModel integration, 2) Sheet presentation and data flow, 3) Platform selection, 4) Date/time picker, 5) Pull-to-refresh, 6) Accessibility (VoiceOver) labels.

Implementation of iOS MeetingListView, MeetingEditSheet, and MeetingGenerateLinkSheet complete. All files created with Liquid Glass design, accessibility labels, and integration with existing MeetingListViewModel. Created IMPLEMENTATION_SUMMARY.md documenting all features and design decisions.
reason: Completed all implementation tasks as specified in context.md
